songs.title: The Hills (Lil Bitch Remix)
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1: Lil Bitch]
I never really heard that shit
I never really fucked his bitch
Never really hit a lick, goddamn
Never really saw through your shit
But right now I’m done with it, done with it
I told myself I passed this shit, past this shit
I guess it wasn’t evident, I ended it
Needed a new start, I’m confident
I pop these hoes like Vicodin
I grant my wishes, no Aladdin
But I’m landing, keep expanding
I get rich, my understanding
I drop tracks, they keep demanding
Take them drugs, they so relaxing
Fought the war, the only standing

[Chorus: The Weeknd]
I only call you when it's half past five
The only time that I'll be by your side
I only love it when you touch me, not feel me
When I'm fucked up, that's the real me
When I'm fucked up, that's the real me, yeah
I only call you when it's half past five
The only time I'd ever call you mine
I only love it when you touch me, not feel me
When I'm fucked up, that's the real me
When I'm fucked up, that's the real me, babe

[Verse 2: Lil Bitch]
Bitch I’m fucked up, time to drug up
I can’t feel my face, I’m so numb
When I call her I talk dumb
Babe it’s the drugs yo, not my tongue
I’m just having a little fun
Ain’t no time to see the sun
Hit and dip I’m always done
See the medal already won
Took the fight on the stage, yeah I’m winning
Fought my demons and now I’m grinning
I don’t eat twice a day, I’m thinning
Drink the lean and now I’m swinging
Ain’t like this from the beginning
Always talk bout my upbringing
I only rap on tracks, I let The Weeknd do the singing

[Chorus: The Weeknd]
I only call you when it's half past five
The only time that I'll be by your side
I only love it when you touch me, not feel me
When I'm fucked up, that's the real me
When I'm fucked up, that's the real me, yeah
I only call you when it's half past five
The only time I'd ever call you mine
I only love it when you touch me, not feel me
When I'm fucked up, that's the real me
When I'm fucked up, that's the real me, babe
